name: Mommy/Tita Cecille
wishText: May our family always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many more blessings to come!
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Thank you for all your blessings and gifts you gave to us.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. Lastly, we appreciate you
